g.aria-label: X-axis titled 'mean execution time in ns' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 350,000

Y-axis titled 'algorithm' for a discrete scale with 14 values: (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionKernelOuter, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionTempScaledOuterLoopKernel, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionInnerAndOuterLoopUnrolled, (wilczek) Outer- and Inner-Loop Vectorization, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolution, ending with (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionOuterLoopUnrolled
